articles.content: Tata caught all other manufacturers in India napping with its EV onslaught. Earlier everyone would say EVs are the future, but Tata changed the notion to EVs are the present. To continue on this mant… [+1976 chars]

articles.author: Jinit Parmar
articles.title: I haven't carried a wallet anywhere in India this month, says Jay Kotak - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Hails UPI,  says be it street snacks, medicines, restaurants or tips, all the payments done through UPI. The average UPI transaction cost is near 0 compared to around one percent for cards, says Kotak
articles.content: Jay Kotak, co-head of Kotak 811, the digital arm of Kotak Mahindra Bank, and the son of the private bank's MD and CEO Uday Kotak, has not carried a wallet in a month. He didn't feel the need for it.… [+2253 chars]
